definition: to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)
(coll.) to break loose/to shake off responsibility

sentences.english: Be careful, that's a catch question.
sentences.chinese: 你可要當心，那個問題是個套兒。

sentences.english: the man with mittens intermittently intervened the remittance.
sentences.chinese: 戴連指手套兒的人間歇地介入匯款。

sentences.english: She had planned it all and waited for him to fall into the trap.
sentences.chinese: 一切都是她佈置好的，單等他來上套兒。

sentences.english: They're quite expensive, though. Frankly, I draw a line at spending much for gloves.
sentences.chinese: 它們太貴了率直的說，買手套兒花幾多錢，我有限度。

sentences.english: i have a pair of leather mittens.
sentences.chinese: 我有一副皮連指手套兒。
